page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: This particular area is essentially covered with rough grazing land though there is one complete village in our block, Ashurstwood ,and the northern end of Forest Row. We have concentrated on issues such as law and order and the attitude of people to such things as politics and religion. Four large farms dominate the region and their land takes up 65% of our area.We visited a number of farming locations and some work was done on Owletts Farm. Our block has 3 different types of schools in it and we studied two. Sackville School is a 1600 comprehensive while Emerson College is a private college specialising in rural studies.
